N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 444.8 - Discipline of Children

State Regulations
(a) Deprivation of meals, snacks, mail, or
visits by the child's family, as methods of discipline are
prohibited. (b) Room isolation, as
a method of discipline, is prohibited. (c) Corporal punishment is
prohibited. (d) Solitary
confinement is prohibited. (e) Discipline shall be prescribed, administered, and supervised only by adults. Such responsibilities shall never be delegated to children. Notes
